page.title: 13GILMORTON TENNIS CLUB
page.content: The tennis courts in Gilmorton were built in the late 1960s.The money to build them was raised by the village.They stand on land leased from the Parish council. The Tennis Club was first formed in May 1974 with a chairman,secretary and treasurer. The club now serves a membership of approximately 70 to 80 junior and senior members who live in Gilmorton and the surrounding villages.The club is responsible for general running costs and maintenance of the courts.Rent is paid to the parish council each year.
